text: Sean Vendy (born 18 May 1996) is a badminton player from England. He started playing badminton at aged 5 in Orkney, then moved to England at 7. He became the England national badminton team in May 2015. == Achievements == === European Junior Championships === Boys' doubles {| class="sortable wikitable" style="font-size: 90%;" ! Year !
